diceResult.label: Dice Result
diceResult.text: The dice result for the {{ type }} is:

guestLvl.high: highly attended (there are still some free seats, but finding a free table is difficult)
guestLvl.full: full (it's quite busy, finding a free seat is difficult)
guestLvl.overfilled: overfilled (it's so full that many guests have to stand)

beds.price: The cost for a bed in the shared room is {{priceGroupRoom}} haler, for a twin room it is {{priceTwinRoom}} silver thalers, and for a single room it is {{priceSingleRoom}} silver thalers.

keeper.chubby: a chubby, cozy innkeeper constantly polishing the same glass
keeper.flirtingOldCouple: an elderly innkeeper couple constantly flirting with each other
keeper.arguingYoungCouple: a young innkeeper couple constantly arguing
keeper.oldHearingImpaired: a very old, hard-of-hearing innkeeper with a cane
keeper.robustSisters: two robust sisters with loud voices
keeper.hummingBearded: a thin innkeeper with a scruffy beard, quietly humming to himself
keeper.irritableWig: a slender, slightly irritable innkeeper with a cheap wig
keeper.baldGambler: a bald innkeeper who loves to gamble with the guests over drinks
keeper.burlyHighPitched: a burly innkeeper with a high-pitched voice
keeper.popEyedWeakness: a pop-eyed innkeeper with a weakness for arithmetic
keeper.devoutMissionary: a devout innkeeper with a missionary zeal
keeper.plumpHeroes: a plump innkeeper with a preference for fresh heroes
keeper.strongBearded: a strongly scented innkeeper with a thick beard
keeper.cheerfulLaugh: an old innkeeper with a cheerful laugh
keeper.oneArmedPatch: a one-armed innkeeper with an eye patch
keeper.youngDaughter: the twelve-year-old daughter of the innkeeper, playing innkeeper on her birthday
keeper.bottleThrowers: an innkeeper couple, him fat, her thin, who throw bottles at each other
keeper.shortBulbousNose: a short innkeeper with a thick, red bulbous nose
keeper.drunkenAxe: a completely drunk innkeeper leaning on a rusty axe

attendants.aloneInBar: Innkeeper is currently alone in the tavern
attendants.youngMoha: an eight-year-old Moha claiming to be the innkeeper's son
attendants.slenderPoet: a lanky bartender constantly pushing his poems on the guests
attendants.harelipAccent: a young bartender with a harelip and a put-on accent
attendants.nervousThin: a thin bartender with wild hair, nervously chewing nails
attendants.beardedConfusion: an old bartender with a goatee, mistaking one of the heroes for a celebrity
attendants.friendlyGloomy: a usually friendly barmaid with a gloomy look
attendants.youngCrisis: a young couple in a relationship crisis
attendants.amuletSiblings: brother and sister, both covered in amulets
attendants.tattooedGiant: a face-tattooed giant with a bushy mustache
attendants.quietPregnant: a very softly speaking, heavily pregnant barmaid
attendants.strongKnife: a strong barmaid with a headscarf carrying a chopper at her belt
attendants.goodnaturedShrunkenHead: a good-natured bartender with blond curls carrying a shrunken head on his belt
attendants.halfElfJokes: a half-elven bartender constantly cracking bad jokes
attendants.armWrestling: a plump barmaid challenging guests to arm wrestling
attendants.lispingFakeRelics: a lisping bartender selling fake relics under the table
attendants.ghostCleaner: a ghost seemingly cleaning tables deep into the night

events.salesEvent: sales event of a traveling merchant
events.famousHeroGuest: a famous hero is a guest in the house
events.fansVictoryMeeting: fan meeting after the victory of the local Imman team
events.fansDefeatMeeting: fan meeting after the defeat of the local Imman team
events.missionaryAttempts: missionary attempts of a radical itinerant preacher
events.privateParty: private party (1d6: 1: birthday party, 2: guild drinking session, 3: conspiratorial political meeting, 4: wannabe secret society, 5: hero group, 6: followers of a forbidden cult)

specialFeatures.gamblingDen: gambling den in the back room
specialFeatures.shrine: shrine (on 1d20: 1-5: Travia, 6-9: Rahja, 10-12: Peraine, 13-15: Aves, 16-18: local saint, 19-20: other deity)
specialFeatures.curiosities: collection of curiosities (stuffed animals, painted plates, saint statues, weapons, armors, etc.)
specialFeatures.innCat: inn cat rubbing against heroes' legs or unexpectedly jumping on them
specialFeatures.serialKillerCannibal: innkeeper is a serial killer and/or cannibal
specialFeatures.text: The following might be special about the tavern:

specialGuests.cardPlayingOldMen: group of old men playing cards
specialGuests.praiosSchoolClass: class from a Praios day school
specialGuests.incognitoOperaTenor: incognito traveling opera tenor from Vinsalt

namegenerator.noNoble: With this selection, there are no noble names, so only regular names will be displayed.

smith.price: Price per working hour in silver thaler

material.label: Material
material.tooltip1: Only certain weapons/armor, such as spears, axes, and knives are suitable as stone weapons.
material.tooltip2: Only maces, crowbills, morning stars, and similar blunt weapons without a blade can be made from these materials.
material.tooltip3: Only plate armor can be made from these materials.

boni.label: Improvements
boni.speed: Ignore -1 MOV due to ENC or additional penalties
boni.initiative: Ignore -1 INI due to ENC or additional penalties

itemText.result: The manufacturing costs for the selected settings are {{price}} silver thalers. The smith took {{time}} days for the manufacturing.

meteor.text: The equipment has the following effect due to meteoric iron:
meteor.vibrating: The object vibrates at full moon.
meteor.damage: The object causes +2 DP against beings not from the 3rd sphere.
meteor.voices: The wearer of the object hears whispering voices in an unknown language every 1D6 days.
meteor.invisible: At full moon, the object is fully visible, but it becomes more transparent with the waning moon. During the new moon, the object is practically invisible.
meteor.wolves: Wolves within a 9-mile radius protect the wearer of the object and howl every night.
meteor.life: The wearer loses 1 LP every day, which is absorbed by the object.
meteor.focus: For the wearer, summoning extra-spherical beings is made 1 point easier on a roll of 1-3 on a D6, and 1 point harder on a roll of 4-6 when the object is used as a focus.
meteor.gravity: Once every 1D6 days, gravity in a 9-step radius is nullified for 1D20 seconds.

itemText.failed: The equipment could not be manufactured.

bookCount.label: Number of books
bookCount.tooltip: The number of books is limited to a maximum of 50.

bookFeatures.format: The book has an unusual format, deviating from its usual production. Examples include landscape instead of portrait format, a pentagonal book or a leporello, parchment or papyrus instead of paper, perhaps even human or dwarven skin, living eyes, parts of animals such as wings, feathers, or tails as bookmarks.
bookFeatures.page: There is an additional loose page between the book's pages. It might be a piece of paper someone placed there, or a page from another book.
bookFeatures.gem: The book is in very good condition and adorned with gemstones (+10% of the price).
bookFeatures.signature: The author has left their signature (+20% of the price).
bookFeatures.comments: Someone, possibly a previous owner of the book, has written many comments and cross-references to other books within the book.
bookFeatures.dirty: Stains and smudges have rendered part of the text illegible (-20% of the price).
bookFeatures.wax: The pages of the book are wax-treated to protect it from moisture (+20% of the price).
bookFeatures.decoration: The book features numerous decorations (+10% of the price).
bookFeatures.different: The book's cover does not match the content. Perhaps someone tried to hide a forbidden or censored book.
bookFeatures.burned: Burn marks have disfigured the book (-10% of the price).
bookFeatures.missingPages: 1D20 pages of the book have been removed (-30% of the price).
bookFeatures.noBinding: The book's binding is missing (-10% of the price).
bookFeatures.wet: Moisture has created holes in the pages (-20% of the price).
bookFeatures.lock: The book features a (dwarven) lock. It can only be opened without a key with a lock-picking check (normal/dwarven) -2/-5 (normal/dwarven) (+10/30% (normal/dwarven) of the price).
bookFeatures.worms: Bookworms have eaten holes into the book (-20% of the price).
bookFeatures.noVowels: The author, possibly to save ink and paper or as a joke, has omitted all vowels. Understanding the book requires 25% more time than usual.
bookFeatures.encrypted: The book is encrypted. Roll 1D6: 1-2 primitive encryption, 3-4 simple encryption, 5-6 complex encryption.
bookFeatures.missingM: Every page of the book is missing the letter M, or it has been replaced by the number 12. M is the 13th letter of the alphabet and is considered unlucky by some.
bookFeatures.noIllustration: All illustrations have been removed or pages torn out. Perhaps someone wanted to censor some details (-10% of the price).
bookFeatures.poison: The pages of the book are partially contaminated with poison (e.g., Kelmon).
bookFeatures.open: The book can only be opened at a certain time of day, for example, at night. It is under an OBJECTOFIXO-like spell of guild magic origin from the time of the Great Guild of Mages.
bookFeatures.demon: A minor demon is bound to the book.
bookFeatures.ghost: A spirit is bound to the book.
bookFeatures.schelm: All letters run and then reappear. Some change positions, or the writing glows, or individual letters jump out of the book. The reader cannot read the book because of this. The magic on the book seems to be of a mischievous origin.
bookFeatures.reader: A magical trick causes each opened page of the book to be read aloud by a pleasant voice.
bookFeatures.xenographus: A XENOGRAPHUS spell on the book allows it to be understood by any reader.
bookFeatures.memorans: The book is under a MEMORANS spell, ensuring the reader remembers its contents.
bookFeatures.cryptogrpho: The book is secured by a CRYPTOGRAPHO spell.
bookFeatures.mirrowed: A magical trick has caused the writing to appear mirrored.
bookFeatures.fireResistent: Spells have made the book fire-resistant. The magic seems to be of guild magic origin.
bookFeatures.custodosigil: A CUSTODOSIGIL spell is placed on the book.
bookFeatures.protected: A protection spell is triggered when the book is opened (1D6, with skill level 16): PARALYSIS (1), CORPOFESSO (2), HORRIPHOBUS (3), FULMINICTUS (4), SALANDER (5), IGNISPHAERO (6). Only someone who knows the solution word can open the book unharmed.
bookFeatures.oneTime: Once a text is read, it disappears forever.
bookFeatures.memory: The book is under an MEMORY LEAVE YOU spell.

about.title: Welcome to our unofficial "The Dark Eye" help site
about.intro: This website was developed to support you and your gaming group in your adventures in the world of The Dark Eye. Here you will find a variety of tools and generators to make your gameplay easier and to enhance immersion.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: A central hub that displays all the available functions of this website at a glance.

madaphase.title: Mada Phase
madaphase.description: Calculate the current phase of the moons to better understand the magical influences in your adventure.

weekday.title: Weekday
weekday.description: Determine the current weekday in the Aventurian calendar to seamlessly integrate your story into the game world.

currency.title: Currency Converter
currency.description: Effortlessly convert between the various currencies of Aventuria to realistically handle trade and transactions.

alchemy.title: Alchemy
alchemy.description: Use our alchemy tool to create potions and mixtures that your heroes can use in the game.

tavern.title: Tavern Generator
tavern.description: Create random taverns and inns where your heroes can rest - including names and unique features.

names.title: Name Generator
names.description: Find fitting names for characters that appear in your story.

smith.title: Smith Generator
smith.description: Generate random weapons and armor with unique properties.

books.title: Book Generator
books.description: Create unique books and scrolls that your heroes can discover in the world of Aventuria.

report.title: Bug Report and Feedback
report.description: Help us improve the website by reporting bugs or making suggestions for improvement.

legal.title: Legal
legal.description: Here you will find legal information.

about.conclusion: We hope these tools help you make your adventures even more exciting and immersive. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us!

error.filesize: File is too large. Maximum 2 MB allowed.

bugReport.send: Thank you. Your report has been received.

legalNotice.legal1: This website and the tools offered on it are fan projects and are not officially affiliated with Ulisses Spiele GmbH, the rights holder of 'Das Schwarze Auge'. 'Das Schwarze Auge' and all associated terms and rules are copyrighted and belong to Ulisses Spiele GmbH.
legalNotice.legal2: All content that is not explicitly the property of Ulisses Spiele GmbH is the property of the authors of this website.
legalNotice.legal3: This website offers unofficial tools and information about 'Das Schwarze Auge'. The content provided on this website is created by fans for fans and is not to be considered official information. For official information, please visit the Ulisses Spiele GmbH website.
